comment:
* Describes how the pixels of physical display device reflects the content of * a logical display. *

* This information is used by the input system to translate touch input from * physical display coordinates into logical display coordinates. *

* * @hide Only for use within the system server.

variables.name: valid
variables.comment: True if this viewport is valid.

variables.name: isActive
variables.comment: True if this viewport is active.

variables.name: orientation
variables.comment: The rotation applied to the physical coordinate system.

variables.name: logicalFrame
variables.comment: The portion of the logical display that are presented on this physical display.

variables.name: physicalFrame
variables.comment: should be scaled or translated after rotation.

variables.name: deviceWidth
variables.comment: The physical frame should usually fit within this area.

variables.name: uniqueId
variables.comment: The ID used to uniquely identify this display.

variables.name: physicalPort
variables.comment: The physical port that the associated display device is connected to.

methods.name: public DisplayViewport makeCopy()
methods.comment: * Creates a copy of this DisplayViewport.

methods.name: public static String typeToString(@ViewportType int viewportType)

methodNames: public static String typeToString(@ViewportType int viewportType)
